GlmTranslate.apiKey.description: Glm 翻译的 API 密钥 [必填]
GlmTranslate.apiKey.markdownDescription: API key for Glm Translate. **This field cannot be empty.**

GlmTranslate.model.markdownDescription: Model to use for translation. Default is `glm-4`.

GlmTranslate.apiUrl.markdownDescription: API URL for Glm Translate. Default is `https://open.bigmodel.cn/api/paas/v4/chat/completions`.

GlmTranslate.doSample.description: 是否使用采样进行翻译
GlmTranslate.doSample.markdownDescription: Whether to use sampling for translation. Default is `true`.

GlmTranslate.systemPrompt.markdownDescription:
System context source Language: ${source}
Target Language: ${target}

GlmTranslate.prompt.default:
Translate the following GitHub content to ${target}:
Source Text: ${content}

GlmTranslate.user_id.markdownDescription: User ID for Glm Translate. 6-1024 characters.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
